rooms.description: Spacious entrance with natural light and eco-friendly flooring materials. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the entry to the east for positive energy.
Open-plan living area with large windows, natural ventilation, and energy-efficient LED lighting. Placed in the northeast to harness positive energy.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-saving appliances, ample natural light and a south-east orientation per Vastu guidelines.
Compact bathroom for guests. Natural ventilation is provided, with eco-friendly water fixtures and proper waste management.
Storage space for appliances, cleaning supplies, and recycling. Features low-energy lighting and proper ventilation.
Two-car garage with space for vehicles and storage, designed for easy access from the entrance. Equipped with sustainable lighting and ventilation.
Modern, eco-friendly staircase that connects ground floor to upper level, designed for safety and minimal environmental impact.
Dedicated area for maintenance and utility connections. Incorporates green design principles with energy-efficient fixtures.

openings.description: Energy-efficient glass door leading into the entrance hall, designed to minimize heat loss while maximizing natural light.
Double-glazed windows for improved insulation and energy efficiency. Placed strategically per Vastu guidelines.
South-east facing window ensuring adequate natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles.
Heavy-duty insulated garage door designed for energy conservation and security.

rooms.description: Eco-friendly bedroom with sustainable materials, natural light from east-facing windows, and energy-saving fixtures. Aligned with Vastu for positive energy.
Comfortable bedroom designed as a bachelor pad style guest room, emphasizing open spaces and natural light, with eco-friendly finishes.
Spacious balcony adjacent to the master bedroom for relaxation and fresh air. Incorporates green design with energy-efficient railings.
Modern bathroom with water-saving fixtures, natural light through frosted glass windows and eco-friendly materials.
Eco-friendly rooftop terrace designed for relaxation, gardening, or gatherings. Features solar panels and sustainable landscaping elements.
Integrated closet space in the master bedroom with sustainable wood finishes, designed for optimal organization and minimal energy usage.

openings.description: East-facing window to maximize natural light and positive energy flow, following Vastu guidelines.
North-east facing window to ensure a calm environment with adequate ventilation.
Eco-friendly sliding door for balcony access, ensuring minimal space intrusion and maximum natural light.
